column4: Light, yes I know how to access the themes tab. But how do I install my new theme? It is in .tar.gz format/
drag and drop the tar onto the open theme manager
Is it a gdm theme or what type of theme is it
Do you have a link to that theme
Certainly.
http://themes.freshmeat.net/redir/spitfire2/74504/url_tgz/spitfire2-default-0.9.tar.gz
It was implied that you provide the link so we can see what it is.. only if you want us to help you of course
have I done something wrong? The link is there, right?
I see it .. I just need to look at something
ahh right okay. Thjanks alot.
It will now be in the list of available themes
when you dropped it did it say it was installing
no nothing like that.
I dont seem to be able to make the window smaller either.
any way of doing so?
cant help you with that.. I have never used a tv for my monitor
any idea why it isnt installing? Is there a portation of the screen lowerr down after the Human and Mist themes that I cant see that migh5t be preventing me from installing it correctly?
yes, it could be below what you can see.
what about the super/win key and roll the mouse?  doe that do anything
let me point out hat this is a Microsoft winows keyboard. :|
it didnt work/
just makes th window larger. DOesnt seem like you can make thw window smaller this way.
